text: Lotus Eaters is a 2011 British drama film directed by Alexandra McGuinness and starring Antonia Campbell-Hughes, Johnny Flynn and Benn Northover. It is McGuinness' directorial debut. ==Cast== *Antonia Campbell-Hughes as Alice *Johnny Flynn as Charlie *Benn Northover as Felix *Liam Browne as Benedict *Amber Anderson as Suzi *Jay Choi as Lulu *Gina Bramhill as Bella *Daisy Lewis as Saskia *Cynthia Fortune Ryan as Orna *Katrena Rochell as Leni *Alex Wyndham as Marlon *Chloe Jenden as Casting Agent *Anna Bondareva as Lottie *Nicola Wren as Indira ==Reception== , the film holds an 8% approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes, based on thirteen reviews with an average rating on 4.92 out of 10. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:English-language films Category:2011 films Category:British drama films Category:British films Category:2011 directorial debut films
title: Lotus Eaters (2011 film)
